card.name: Tata Neu Plus SBI Card
card.bank: SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited
card.description: Earn NeuCoins & Exclusive Rewards with Tata Neu Plus SBI Card. Enjoy welcome benefits, reward points on spends, domestic lounge access, fuel surcharge waiver, and more.
card.target_audience: Personal users interested in lifestyle benefits and rewards on Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands.

categories.name: Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands
categories.description: 2% value back as NeuCoins on spends
categories.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual in SBI card system will be done as per the updated MID list, reviewed monthly.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands
categories.exclusions: Fuel Spends, Wallet loads, Rental/Gift or Prepaid Card load, Voucher purchase, Cash Advances, Payment of Outstanding Balances, Payment of card fees and other charges, Flexipay, Rental and Government related transactions, Education payments.

categories.name: Select category spends on Tata Neu App/Website
categories.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual as per updated MID list.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on select categories on Tata Neu App/Website

categories.name: Other spends including UPI transactions (RuPay Variant)
categories.description: 1% value back as NeuCoins, capped at 500 NeuCoins per statement cycle for UPI spends
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on spends on RuPay Variant
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on other categories including UPI transactions

bonus_rates.validity: Within 15 days of realization of joining fee
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Welcome gift of 499 NeuCoins credited to Tata NeuPass account post annual fee realization.

redemption.process: NeuCoins automatically transferred to cardholder’s NeuPass account within 7 working days of statement cycle. Redeem via Tata Pay on Mobile App/Website.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: SBI Card must not be overdue, suspended, blocked, cancelled, or terminated at time of point transfer. Points cannot be exchanged for cash or credit or used for cash advances.
redemption.processing_time: Within 7 working days of statement cycle

redemption.process: Redeem via Loyalty Redemption option on order/payment page through Mobile App/Website or at Point of Sales partner stores.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Applicable brands and stores include Tata Neu, Air India Express, Big Basket, Croma, IHCL Hotels, Westside, Tata Cliq, Tata 1 MG, Titan, Tanishq.
redemption.processing_time: Within 7 working days of statement cycle

benefits.name: 499 NeuCoins
benefits.description: Welcome gift credited to Tata NeuPass account post annual fee realization.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay joining fee of Rs. 499 + taxes.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Credited within 15 days of joining fee realization.

benefits.name: 4 complimentary domestic airport lounge accesses per year
benefits.description: 4 complimentary domestic airport lounge access per year (1 per quarter), applicable on achieving Rs. 50,000 spends in previous quarter.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Plus SBI Credit Card at respective lounges.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Spend Rs. 50,000 in previous quarter to avail. Waived for newly issued cards in issuance month and quarter.

benefits.name: 1% fuel surcharge waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions from Rs. 500 up to Rs. 4,000 at petrol pumps across India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Plus SBI Card for fuel purchase between Rs. 500 to Rs. 4,000.
benefits.value: Maximum waiver Rs. 250 per statement cycle
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Waiver applies per statement cycle, exclusive of GST and other charges.

benefits.name: Annual Fee Reversal
benefits.description: Annual fee reversal on annual spends of Rs. 1 Lakh or more.
benefits.how_to_avail: Spend Rs. 1 Lakh or more annually.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Fee reversal is preconditioned on fee levied during renewal cycle.
benefits.eligibility: Cardholders with annual spends >= Rs. 1 Lakh

benefits.name: Add-on Cards for family
benefits.description: Empower family with add-on cards for parents, spouse, children or siblings above 18 years.
benefits.how_to_avail: Request add-on cards from SBI Card.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Add-on cards have no annual fee.

benefits.name: Contactless payments
benefits.description: Fast, easy, and secure contactless payments with Visa payWave technology.
benefits.how_to_avail: Wave card at secure reader for transactions up to Rs. 5000 without PIN.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Payment limit Rs. 5000 per transaction without PIN.

benefits.name: Utility bill payments
benefits.description: Pay electricity, telephone, mobile and other utility bills using Easy Bill Pay facility.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Easy Bill Pay on Tata Neu Plus SBI Card.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Facility available on Tata Neu Plus SBI Card.

benefits.name: Easy monthly installments
benefits.description: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into easy monthly installments.
benefits.how_to_avail: Transact Rs. 2,500+ and convert within 30 days on sbicard.com.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Interest applicable as per plan selected.

benefits.name: Balance transfer facility
benefits.description: Transfer outstanding balances from other banks’ credit cards to Tata Neu Plus SBI Card at lower interest rates.
benefits.how_to_avail: Apply on sbicard.com with user ID and password.
benefits.value: Save money on credit card dues
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transfer Rs. 5,000, max 75% of available credit limit.

partnerships.how_to_avail: Spend on Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual as per updated MID list monthly.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee levied on opening of Card Account, subject to change at discretion of SBICPSL.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Reversal on annual spends of Rs. 1 Lakh or more
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee levied annually during month of Card Account opening, subject to change.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Reversal on annual spends of Rs. 1 Lakh or more
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee levied from second year onwards, subject to change.
